text:
Flight Labs | San Francisco, NYC | Full-time | Onsite

We're a new startup, founded by veterans from Apple, Slack, and Dropbox, working on a ground-up rethink of the consumer productivity space. We're mixing 100% native applications with a modern serverless backend, all in service of delivering the best possible user experience.

We're looking for an iOS engineer who loves building highly-polished applications. For more information, visit: http://flightlabs.co/people/ios/
